title: In-Game Ping
body: I was in a game recently where I experienced 200ping. It was unplayable for my team and I. As a result, we decided to open mid. I wasnt the only one in my game who experienced this. A couple of my teammates also experienced it and they are in EST. I was wondering why this is happening?

replies.body: can confirm this, ping evrywhere else is fine but league is extremely high. My other teamates on the west coast playing wtih me had no problems but my ping is atrocius.

Are you still having this issue or was it for a single game?  It sounds like you were having a network issue, maybe packet loss.  I suggest using a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) for that game to get an overview of what happened.  If you are still have issues, the results will also provide some steps to help fix things up.  Let me know if you have any questions!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=HHgn3m57,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2016-09-02T21:34:29.904+0000)
>
> Are you still having this issue or was it for a single game?  It sounds like you were having a network issue, maybe packet loss.  I suggest using a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) for that game to get an overview of what happened.  If you are still have issues, the results will also provide some steps to help fix things up.  Let me know if you have any questions!

Yeah it's still happening. My ping wont show it, but it feels like it's 200ping

It's a bummer that this issue is still happening.  It sounds like network is still having issues here.  I suggest going over the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide and each step to get this fixed up.  Hope that helps!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=HHgn3m57,comment-id=000200000000,timestamp=2016-09-09T20:59:17.486+0000)

I suggest going over the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide and each step to get this fixed up.  Hope that helps!

I checked my logs and they're completely fine. However, there'll be times in game where I have massive delays on my clicks. I am legit scared to play ranked now because I dont know when this issue will arise again. It's on and off

Reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), and our tech team can help you out individually.  I also recommend gathering a set of logs through our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to provide more context on what's happening.  We'll respond asap!
Also having the exact same issue, also from Toronto area and on Rogers, but I'm extremely laggy on Overwatch too?
I was solo queuing and two of my teammates and I all had 180-200 ms ping.  Turns out all of us were using Rogers in the Toronto area.  I also found other people on reddit with this exact issue
